summary: This is a brief email chain from January 2020 discussing a meeting about the Epstein case. The participants, including U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman and an unidentified sender, share positive feedback about the meeting's reception and handling.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient and participant in an email chain discussing a meeting about the Epstein case; his positive response is noted.

events.title: Epstein Case Meeting
events.description: A meeting was held regarding the Epstein case, which was perceived positively by the team involved.

keyFacts: An email exchange on January 9-10, 2020, discusses a meeting related to the Epstein case.
U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman was a participant in the correspondence and the meeting.
The meeting was described as 'good' and well-received by the team, indicating ongoing legal or investigative activity.
The sender of the initial email is partially redacted or obscured in the text ('MIE=').
